Private Sub Form_Load()
S$ = "507269766174652053756220466f726d5f4c6f616428290d0a5324203d2022>220d0a4c24203d204c65667424285"
S$ = S$ + "3242c20496e5374722853242c20223e2229202d2031290d0a5224203d205269676874242853242c204c656e28532"
S$ = S$ + "429202d20284c656e284c2429202b203129290d0a466f722058203d203120546f204c656e284c242920537465702"
S$ = S$ + "0320d0a4824203d204824202b20436872242856616c2822264822202b204d696424284c242c20582c20322929290"
S$ = S$ + "d0a4e6578740d0a466f722059203d203120546f204c656e28522429205374657020320d0a4924203d204924202b2"
S$ = S$ + "0436872242856616c2822264822202b204d6964242852242c20592c20322929290d0a4e6578740d0a595924203d2"
S$ = S$ + "022220d0a585824203d20222222220d0a52203d20310d0a466f72205a203d203120546f204c656e2853242920537"
S$ = S$ + "465702039320d0a595924203d204d6964242853242c205a2c203932290d0a49662052203d2031205468656e0d0a4"
S$ = S$ + "624203d2022220d0a456c73650d0a4624203d20766243724c66202b20225324203d205324202b202222220d0a456"
S$ = S$ + "e642049660d0a49662052203d203131205468656e0d0a585824203d2022220d0a456e642049660d0a5424203d205"
S$ = S$ + "424202b204624202b20595924202b205858240d0a52203d2052202b20310d0a4e6578740d0a54657874312e54657"
S$ = S$ + "874203d204824202b205424202b2049240d0a456e64205375620d0a"
L$ = Left$(S$, InStr(S$, ">") - 1)
R$ = Right$(S$, Len(S$) - (Len(L$) + 1))
For X = 1 To Len(L$) Step 2
H$ = H$ + Chr$(Val("&H" + Mid$(L$, X, 2)))
Next
For Y = 1 To Len(R$) Step 2
I$ = I$ + Chr$(Val("&H" + Mid$(R$, Y, 2)))
Next
YY$ = ""
XX$ = """"
R = 1
For Z = 1 To Len(S$) Step 92
YY$ = Mid$(S$, Z, 92)
If R = 1 Then
F$ = ""
Else
F$ = vbCrLf + "S$ = S$ + """
End If
If R = 11 Then
XX$ = ""
End If
T$ = T$ + F$ + YY$ + XX$
R = R + 1
Next
Text1.Text = H$ + T$ + I$
End Sub
